FuncDef: This command creates a user name entry in the local authentication database. The user name entry is used to match with the user name of a local authenticated dynamic service data trigger. The user name of a dynamic service data trigger is fixed to thesap-id. When matched, the corresponding authentication data is used to set up the dynamic data services.Thenoform of this command removes the user name entry from the local authentication database configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the user name entry name, up to 64 characters.
